game_description: IDCraft 0086 is a high speed space shooter with retro style graphics. Controls: Game works with one controller, just turn it in the direction you want the ship to navigate to and press the trigger button to move. Stop near enemies when the spacecraft's laser tracker (green) is activated and ship will automatically fire. Most enemies use an aiming tracker (red) for aiming, stay clear of the trackers as they will be followed by lasers. By using our app you are agreeing to our terms and conditions. We collect anonymous telemetry metrics used solely for the sake of improving our products and services. Note that you can always disable telemetry at anytime by going into Main Menu > Settings > Telemetry. Music credits for the trailer: Epic Cinematic Gaming Cyberpunk | RESET by Alex-Productions | https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCx0_M61F81Nfb-BRXE-SeVA Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/ Creative Commons CC BY 3.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
